import React from 'react' import { Menu, Dropdown } from 'antd' import { connect } from 'react-redux' import styles from './style.module.scss' @connect(({ settings }) => ({ settings })) class LanguageSelector extends React.Component { changeLang = ({ key }) => { const { dispatch } = this.props dispatch({ type: 'settings/CHANGE_SETTING', payload: { setting: 'locale', value: key, }, }) } render() { const { settings: { locale }, } = this.props const language = locale.substr(0, 2) const langMenu = ( üá¨üáß English üá∑üá¥ Rom√¢nƒÉ üá∫üá¶ –£–∫—Ä–∞—ó–Ω—Å—å–∫–∞ üá∑üá∫ –†—É—Å—Å–∫–∏–π ) return (
{language}
) } } export default LanguageSelector
